title: ChatGPT-3.5 Get Started

metadata.description: Learn about ChatGPT-3.5 Get Started with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
How to Get Started with ChatGPT-3.5
If you already have an account with OpenAI and have used ChatGPT before, you can skip this page entirely.
Otherwise, follow these steps to get started with ChatGPT-3.5
Create an account with OpenAI
To use ChatGPT, you need an account at OpenAI.
Register an account at OpenAI:

Go through all the steps: creating a password, validating email, registering name and phone number.
Accept the Terms and Conditions
Make sure to read through the steps before accepting them.
Write your First Prompt
Now we are ready to write our first prompt!

summary: This tutorial covers ChatGPT-3.5 Get Started concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use ChatGPT-3.5 Get Started effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of ChatGPT-3.5 Get Started and how to apply it in your projects.
